description: This game supports English, Spanish, and French. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". In a city where information is heavily monitored, where crime is just a memory, where most people have sacrificed freedom for a comfortable life, some choose to live differently. Some. like you, are Runners, phenomenally agile messengers who deliver sensitive information for a price. You are a Runner called Faith. Murder has come to this city. And now you are being hunted. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

title: Mirror's Edge™
